= Introduction =

This page describes the directory structure I use to do Neurospaces development.  Also the general workflows should be described here.

[http://www.neurospaces.org/ The Neurospaces project] develops several software components useful for simulations using models based on experimental data.

Each software component can have implementations in several programming languages (e.g. there is a java based and C based implementation of the [http://www.neurospaces.org/# model-container component].
